name: Tales of Arcania Pocket Watch Puzzle
name_original: Tales of Arcania Pocket Watch Puzzle
description:
When zoomed out you can use the mouse to look around the watch.

Press Z to either zoom in or back out of the watch face. This should not effect your progress on the puzzle.

This is 3 individual spin combination locks, you must start each by spinning the ring 4 full rotations clockwise.

Use the sliders to rotate their corresponding ring. When you spin the ring to the next section you think is correct, click the button at the bottom of the corresponding slider to lock in that number and continue until you think you have done the correct combination for that ring. You are able to go back to the correct number or placement even if you overshoot. When you believe you have input the correct combination for each ring, hit the submit button to see if you were correct. If you feel you have made a mistake press the reset button. (Note: this resets every ring.) 

If you are using the browser game then you can refer to the screenshot to the right for reference if in game it is too blurry.

Screenshot your correct screen once you solve the puzzle and share with a DM.

We are using the honor system, please keep track and be honest about how many times you unsuccessfully solved the puzzle, as it resets when you refresh the page.

Puzzle Art, Programming, UI: Emily Chauffe

Puzzle Design: DM Noah
